categories: Gear lofts, vestibules and tent add-ons
description: Turn your backpacking tent into a base camp tent. The Gear Shed gives you enough room to remove your wet gear before getting in your tent. And it's great for storing packs and muddy boots, or for giving the dog a dry place to hang out.Fly fabric is lightweight 68-denier polyester with a waterproof polyurethane coating.Floor fabric is durable 70-denier nylon with a long lasting 3,000mm Durashield polyurethane coating.Light grey colour provides neutral light on both bright and dark mornings.Partial floor ensures a clean place to store gear.Adds 2.46sq. m of covered storage.Hooped pole provides a peak height of 89cm.Compatible with the MSR Elixir 1, 2 and 3 and MSR Hubba NX, Hubba Hubba NX and Mutha Hubba NX. Not compatible with the MSR Elixir 4 or MSR Papa Hubba.
name: MSR Gear Shed
